About

Development Group is at team of technology, design and production professionals with experience executing digital projects at the very highest level. We are brought together by a passion for doing things the right way, and contributing work to the digital world that will stand the tests of time. We are committed to helping our clients achieve their goals and push their brands to the next level of thinking. We are a new company, but our key members have been working closely together over the past five years on projects for Coachella Valley Music and Arts Festival, Forest Lawn Memorial-Park Association, Disney and Logitech.
